targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    sum(RequestCount) / 60 AS RPS
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter
   AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(Timestamp), 15) * 15) * 1000 as t,     sum(RequestCount) / 60 AS RPS FROM proton.base_report WHERE Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797)    AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
    t, 
    RequestTimeMax AS Max, 
    RequestTimeQuantiles[1] AS P90,
    RequestTimeQuantiles[2] AS P95,
    RequestTimeQuantiles[3] AS P99
FROM (
    SELECT
        $timeSeries as t
        , maxMerge(RequestTimeMax) AS RequestTimeMax
        , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(RequestTimeQuantiles) AS RequestTimeQuantiles
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter 
      AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END 
    GROUP BY t
    ORDER BY t
) ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT      t,      RequestTimeMax AS Max,      RequestTimeQuantiles[1] AS P90,     RequestTimeQuantiles[2] AS P95,     RequestTimeQuantiles[3] AS P99 FROM (     SELECT         (intDiv(toUInt32(Timestamp), 15) * 15) * 1000 as t         , maxMerge(RequestTimeMax) AS RequestTimeMax         , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(RequestTimeQuantiles) AS RequestTimeQuantiles     FROM proton.base_report     WHERE Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797)        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END      GROUP BY t     ORDER BY t ) ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    Status,
    sum(RequestCount) AS RequestPerMinute
FROM $table
WHERE $timeFilter AND Status > 400
   AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END
GROUP BY t, Status
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(Timestamp), 15) * 15) * 1000 as t,     Status,     sum(RequestCount) AS RequestPerMinute FROM proton.base_report WHERE Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797) AND Status > 400    AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END GROUP BY t, Status ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
    t, 
    UtimeMax AS Max, 
    UtimeQuantiles[1] AS P90,
    UtimeQuantiles[2] AS P95,
    UtimeQuantiles[3] AS P99
FROM (
    SELECT
        $timeSeries as t
        , maxMerge(UtimeMax) AS UtimeMax
        , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(UtimeQuantiles) AS UtimeQuantiles
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter 
      AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END 
    GROUP BY t
    ORDER BY t
) ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT      t,      UtimeMax AS Max,      UtimeQuantiles[1] AS P90,     UtimeQuantiles[2] AS P95,     UtimeQuantiles[3] AS P99 FROM (     SELECT         (intDiv(toUInt32(Timestamp), 15) * 15) * 1000 as t         , maxMerge(UtimeMax) AS UtimeMax         , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(UtimeQuantiles) AS UtimeQuantiles     FROM proton.base_report     WHERE Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797)        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END      GROUP BY t     ORDER BY t ) ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT 
    t, 
    MemoryFootprintMax AS Max, 
    MemoryFootprintQuantiles[1] AS P90,
    MemoryFootprintQuantiles[2] AS P95,
    MemoryFootprintQuantiles[3] AS P99
FROM (
    SELECT
        $timeSeries as t
        , maxMerge(MemoryFootprintMax) AS MemoryFootprintMax
        , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(MemoryFootprintQuantiles) AS MemoryFootprintQuantiles
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter 
      AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END 
    GROUP BY t
    ORDER BY t
) ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT      t,      MemoryFootprintMax AS Max,      MemoryFootprintQuantiles[1] AS P90,     MemoryFootprintQuantiles[2] AS P95,     MemoryFootprintQuantiles[3] AS P99 FROM (     SELECT         (intDiv(toUInt32(Timestamp), 15) * 15) * 1000 as t         , maxMerge(MemoryFootprintMax) AS MemoryFootprintMax         , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(MemoryFootprintQuantiles) AS MemoryFootprintQuantiles     FROM proton.base_report     WHERE Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797)        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END      GROUP BY t     ORDER BY t ) ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    $timeSeries as t,
    SUM(DocumentSizeTotal) AS Traffic
FROM $table
WHERE
    $timeFilter
    AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END
    AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END
    AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END
GROUP BY t
ORDER BY t
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     (intDiv(toUInt32(Timestamp), 15) * 15) * 1000 as t,     SUM(DocumentSizeTotal) AS Traffic FROM proton.base_report WHERE     Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797)     AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END     AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END     AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END GROUP BY t ORDER BY t

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT
    dictGetString('Proton', 'Value', ScriptNameID) AS ScriptName
    , RequestCount 
    , RequestTimeAvg
    , RequestTimeMax
    , RequestTimeQuantiles[1] AS RequestTime_90
    , RequestTimeQuantiles[2] AS RequestTime_95
    , RequestTimeQuantiles[3] AS RequestTime_99
    , UtimeTotal
    , StimeTotal
    , formatReadableSize(TrafficTotal) AS TrafficTotal
    , formatReadableSize(MemoryFootprintTotal) AS MemoryFootprintTotal
FROM (
    SELECT
        ScriptNameID
        , SUM(RequestCount)                    AS RequestCount
        , maxMerge(RequestTimeMax)             AS RequestTimeMax
        , SUM(RequestTimeTotal) / RequestCount AS RequestTimeAvg
        , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(RequestTimeQuantiles) AS RequestTimeQuantiles
        , SUM(UtimeTotal)           AS UtimeTotal
        , SUM(StimeTotal)           AS StimeTotal
        , SUM(DocumentSizeTotal)    AS TrafficTotal
        , SUM(MemoryFootprintTotal) AS MemoryFootprintTotal
    FROM $table
    WHERE $timeFilter
      AND CASE WHEN $schema <> 'all' THEN Schema = $schema ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $hostname <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64($hostname) ELSE 1 END 
      AND CASE WHEN $server_name <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64($server_name) ELSE 1 END
    GROUP BY ScriptNameID
    ORDER BY RequestTimeQuantiles[3] DESC 
    LIMIT 10
) ORDER BY RequestTime_99 DESC
targets.rawQuery: SELECT     dictGetString('Proton', 'Value', ScriptNameID) AS ScriptName     , RequestCount      , RequestTimeAvg     , RequestTimeMax     , RequestTimeQuantiles[1] AS RequestTime_90     , RequestTimeQuantiles[2] AS RequestTime_95     , RequestTimeQuantiles[3] AS RequestTime_99     , UtimeTotal     , StimeTotal     , formatReadableSize(TrafficTotal) AS TrafficTotal     , formatReadableSize(MemoryFootprintTotal) AS MemoryFootprintTotal FROM (     SELECT         ScriptNameID         , SUM(RequestCount)                    AS RequestCount         , maxMerge(RequestTimeMax)             AS RequestTimeMax         , SUM(RequestTimeTotal) / RequestCount AS RequestTimeAvg         , quantilesMerge(0.9,0.95,0.99)(RequestTimeQuantiles) AS RequestTimeQuantiles         , SUM(UtimeTotal)           AS UtimeTotal         , SUM(StimeTotal)           AS StimeTotal         , SUM(DocumentSizeTotal)    AS TrafficTotal         , SUM(MemoryFootprintTotal) AS MemoryFootprintTotal     FROM proton.base_report     WHERE Timestamp >= toDateTime(1547467797)       AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN Schema = 'all' ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN HostnameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END        AND CASE WHEN 'all' <> 'all' THEN ServerNameID = cityHash64('all') ELSE 1 END     GROUP BY ScriptNameID     ORDER BY RequestTimeQuantiles[3] DESC      LIMIT 10 ) ORDER BY RequestTime_99 DESC
